document_data.name: House of Nine Blessings
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Nine Blessings''' was a temple in [[Calimport]] dedicated to the worship of the goddess [[Loviatar]].
document_data.Location: The House of Nine Blessings was located in [[Suq Drudach]], part of the [[Astar√© Sabban]] of [[Shackles Ward]], in Calimport.
document_data.Structure: The building was constructed of white-glazed brick, which made it stand out among surrounding structures. The white bricks were offset by a black and blue mosaic of Loviatar's nine-tailed [[scourge]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was often frequented by slavers.
